commands.wrong-parameter-count: The amount of given parameters does not equal the amount of required parameters for this command. Type `{{help}} {{command}}` for information about this command.
commands.throttle: Your command has been suppressed. Please wait a bit before executing the command again.
commands.error: An unexpected error has occured: ```{{error}}```Give the following code to the author of the bot to help identify the source of this problem: `{{code}}`.
